name: ASSOCIATION FOR DIPLOMATIC STUDIES AND TRAINING
description: ADST is a NPO that produces and shares oral histories by American diplomats.
sampleDescriptions: Inform/engage on ADST's work to establish and maintain the largest collection of diplomatic oral histories.
